mapper.insert: insert into MVA_ALI_INTELLIGENT_ASR (PID, LOG_ID, LEAV_WORD_TIME, ANI, LEAVEWORD_PATH, VOICE_FILE_NAME, CALLID, FULL_PATH) select sys_guid(), LOG_ID, LEAV_WORD_TIME, ANI, LEAVEWORD_PATH, VOICE_FILE_NAME, CALLID, FULL_PATH from IVR_JT_LEAVWORD@HUAWEI_ICD_DB_LINK ivr where not exists (select callid from MVA_ALI_INTELLIGENT_ASR asr where ivr.CALLID = asr.callid)
mapper.select: SELECT PID , LOG_ID , LEAV_WORD_TIME , ANI , LEAVEWORD_PATH , VOICE_FILE_NAME , CALLID , FULL_PATH , ASRFLAG , TASKID , ALI_RESULT , INSERT_TIME , ALIPARSE_STATUS , ISSUBMIT FROM ICC_UNION.MVA_ALI_INTELLIGENT_ASR WHERE ROWNUM <= #{top} AND ISSUBMIT IS NULL AND FULL_PATH IS NOT NULL AND ALI_RESULT IS NULL AND CALLID IS NOT NULL AND (ASRFLAG IS NULL OR ASRFLAG = 2 OR ASRFLAG = 3 OR ASRFLAG = 4) ORDER BY to_date (LEAV_WORD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT PID , LOG_ID , LEAV_WORD_TIME , ANI , LEAVEWORD_PATH , VOICE_FILE_NAME , CALLID , FULL_PATH , ASRFLAG , TASKID , ALI_RESULT , INSERT_TIME , ALIPARSE_STATUS , ISSUBMIT FROM ICC_UNION.MVA_ALI_INTELLIGENT_ASR WHERE ROWNUM <= #{top} AND ISSUBMIT IS NULL AND TASKID IS NOT NULL AND CALLID IS NOT NULL AND ALIPARSE_STATUS IS NULL AND ASRFLAG = 1 ORDER BY to_date (LEAV_WORD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
